reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is ideally situated to visit the Gugenheim Museum and see the city. The staff was very gracious and helpful. They gave us good restaurant recommendations, directions, maps, etc.
reviews.title: Great spot to visit Bilbao

reviews.text: The room was spacious and modern. Very comfortable bed and great bathroom with lots of space and high design fixtures. We enjoyed a view of the river and colored glass balcony.
reviews.title: So minimalistic they dont want staff making it look untidy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others mentioned, the hotel restaurant and bar are not exciting and service is slow and prices a bit steep. The breakfast was extensive although also a bit pricey.
reviews.title: Great location, good hotel, look up to find the sign- no sign at street level!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this to friends and stay here again.
reviews.title: Top choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here 2 nights whilst visiting a supplier. The actual hotel is very good value for the money. It's very modern and minimalistic, all shiny black marble. Just remember you're in Spain - be patient, it'll happen eventually. And the location is excellent.
reviews.title: Very nice but no English speaking TV
Excellent location within walking distance to the Guggenheim
reviews.text: Room and bathroom were spacious and comfortable. It was very quiet. The hotel staff was helpful and even gave us free internet so that we could contact Hotels. com regarding our reservations. The hotel was about equidistant from the Guggenheim Museum and the old town. It is located along the river and the walk is lovely to either location. This is an excellent choice if you are going to Bilbao.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hesperia is a hotel that you can hardly believe you booked with such money. Contemporary, in great location, great rooms, friendly stuff, wifi. I didn't eat in the hotel restaurant but it seems very good. The only problem is that nobody tells you that you have to pay to have a front view room and that the last day they didn't get our room cleaned. Maybe was just a mistake but this thing lowered a little the whole image. But if you go to Bilbao and you make a good bargain through the net, it's the best place to live there.
reviews.title: The best value for money hotel in Bilbao

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good location, nice hotel, we ended up in a smallish back room after coosing various options, non-smoking, queen bed etc. I was hoping for one of the front room with a view but I didn't ask to change it, I suspect they may have done, the staff were very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, shame about the food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The thing that really let the place down was breakfast, they ran out of various bits for ages and the food was cold and not great. One of the heating lamps wasn't working on the buffet so all the hot, veggie, food underneath, like the eggs, were stone cold. I should have complained at the time rather than now.
reviews.title: Bilbao's best bargaign ?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good location for old town, Guggenheim and everything else we did.
reviews.title: perfect hotel to visit Bilbao

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The elegant Hotel Hesperia Bilbao is a short-walk from the Guggeheim Bilbao Museum and has easy access to the old city. The rooms are comfortable and modern from the slate floor in the bathroom to the tinted glass in the reading area. The chic lobby bar offers elegant surroundings for a quiet drink.
reviews.title: Elegant, modern hotel near the Guggenheim

reviews.text: The street can be a bit noisy, especially if you want to take a mid-afternoon siesta. The hotel charges dearly to use its internet connection. However, the room rate is quite reasonable given the excellent quality of the accommodation.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recommend this hotel to couples and singles looking to immerse themselves in contemporary architecture while in Bilbao.
reviews.title: Really good beds and nice view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Please note, there are two Hotel Hesperias in Bilbao. You want the one on Paseo Campo Volantin, on the river opposite the museum.
reviews.title: There must be better places to stay than this.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is perfect, within walking distance of everything and nice places to eat nearby. I did not try dinner at the hotel. The rooms are modern and clean.
reviews.title: Good hotel & good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights and really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is really nice - very modern and quite swanky in parts. Rooms are really good - and the communal areas are very high quality.
reviews.title: Lovely stylish modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate both in the bar and restaurant during our stay - although food is quite expensive it is excellent. We ate burgers in the bar on our first night (as restaurants in the city don't tend to open until 8.30pm and we were too tired to go out!) - these were superb! On our last night we ate in the restaurant - food was very fancy (and really good) but service was quite slow. However the waiters top up your bread basket throughout which my husband definitely appreciated (after his 9th!). The complimentary breakfast in the hotel was fantastic - particularly the brie and goats cheese!
reviews.title: Stylish & Centrally Located

reviews.text: As for location it is very convenient to many of Bilbao's attractions - it is almost opposite the Guggenheim museum and a 5 minute walk to the historic centre, and has great views along the river.
reviews.title: bad service, but located very close to Guggenheim museum
